Reviews.Title: “Website misleading”

Reviews.Content: hotel altough berlin city centre spandau nice city centre shopping mall opposite berlin spandau railwaystation 25 minutes railway trip berlin zoo station howeverthe nearest railwaystation station served trains busstop near hotel strasse hotel clean safe didnt breakfast buffet coffee internet 5 euros 24 hours according travel agency free charge rent bike 12 euros day desk unstaffed check rang bell left hotel checking
